$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/macros.text:
\define sticky-string() \<\\> \define escape-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/sticky-search" /> \define sticky-filter-test() [ \define sticky-filter() <$list filter="[{$:/temp/sticky-search}split[]first[1]!match]" emptyMessage={{$:/temp/sticky-search}}>[search:title,text{$:/temp/sticky-search}]<$list filter="[[$:/temp/sticky-search]!has[text]]">[has[text]] \define sticky-table(macrofilter:"[has[text]]") <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##table-style}!match[none]]" variable="x"> <$vars macro-filter="$macrofilter$"> <$list filter="[regexp:text!is[system]!is[current]subfilterfirst[1]]" emptyMessage={{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##done-message}} variable="x"> <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##table-searchbar}match[show]]" variable="x"> <$wikify name="sticky-filter-result" text=<>> <$list filter="[regexp:text!is[system]!is[current]subfiltersubfiltersort[created]]"> <$list filter="[all[current]get[text]splitregexp[\n]regexp]" variable="line">
<$keyboard key="escape" actions=<>> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/sticky-search" tag="input" default="" placeholder="Search or [[filter]] here, esc to clear" class="sticky-input" />
TiddlerLine
''<$link/>'' <$list filter="[search-replace::regexp{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##table-search},[$1]]" variable="line-clean">>><>
\end \define sticky-list() <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##list-style}!match[none]]" variable="x"> <$list filter="[all[current]regexp:textfirst[1]]" variable="x">
<$list filter="[all[current]get[text]splitregexp[\n]regexp]" variable="line">
>> <$list filter="[search-replace::regexp{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##list-search},[$1]]" variable="line-clean"><>
\end \define sticky-sidebar() <$list filter="[regexp:text!is[system]!is[current]first[1]]" emptyMessage={{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##done-message}} variable="x"> <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##sidebar-searchbar}match[show]]" variable="x"> <$keyboard key="escape" actions=<>> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/sticky-search" tag="input" default="" placeholder="Search or [[filter]] here, esc to clear" class="sticky-input" />
<$wikify name="sticky-filter-result" text=<>> <$list filter="[regexp:text!is[system]!is[current]subfiltersort[created]]"> <$link/>
<$list filter="[all[current]get[text]splitregexp[\n]regexp]" variable="line">
> > <$list filter="[search-replace::regexp{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##sidebar-search},[$1]]" variable="line-clean"><>

\end \define sticky-active-actions() <$list filter="[!match{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##delete-key}]" variable="x"><$action-setfield text={{{ [all[current]get[text]search-replace:g:,] }}}/> <$list filter="[match{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##delete-key}]" variable="x"><$action-setfield text={{{ [all[current]get[text]search-replace:g:,] }}}/> \end \define sticky(txt) <$wikify name="timestamp" text={{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##done-tooltip}}> <$vars out_base="""<> out_end=""" ">>""" > <$vars in="""<>""" out={{{ [addsuffixaddsuffix] }}} del="$txt$"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<> > {{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##char-unchecked}} $txt$ <$list filter="[get[text]splitregexp[\n]regexp[$txt$]count[]compare:integer:gt[1]]" variable="match-count">[<>] \end \define sticky-done-actions() <$list filter="[!match{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##delete-key}]" variable="x"><$action-setfield text={{{ [all[current]get[text]search-replace:g:,] }}}/> <$list filter="[match{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##delete-key}]" variable="x"><$action-setfield text={{{ [all[current]get[text]search-replace:g:,] }}}/> \end \define sticky-done(txt, log) <$vars in="""<>""" out="""<>""" del="$txt$"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="$log$" actions=<> >{{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##char-checked}} $txt$ \end
$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/macros.title: $:/plugins/stobot/sticky/macros
$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/macros.caption: Macros

$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/readme.text:
Sticky Todo is intended as a lightweight addition to your task management toolbox within TiddlyWiki. It's for things that on paper you might add a sticky-note to. Some of those things can be handled in a minute, some of those things might be added to your formal task list. Because of that, the priorities with this plugin are:

# ''Quickness to add to'' - must minimize the interruption to note taking
# ''Lightness of storage'' - no data to be stored outside the tiddler text area where notes are being taken

Much more documentation including a video walkthrough is available at [ext[https://stobot.github.io/sticky/]]

For questions or suggestions, I can be found as @stobot at [ext[https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/]] as well

Note that I'm not an TiddlyWiki expert or software developer and offer no warranty, PLEASE BACKUP before / while using.
$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/readme.title: $:/plugins/stobot/sticky/readme

$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/stylesheet.title: $:/plugins/stobot/sticky/stylesheet

$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/config.text:
\define style-actions(type) <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##$type$-style}match[line]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" $index="$type$-search" $value={{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##line-search}} /> <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##$type$-style}match[trim]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" $index="$type$-search" $value={{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##trim-search}} /> <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##$type$-style}match[todo]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" $index="$type$-search" $value={{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##todo-search}} /> <$list filter="[[$type$]match[sidebar]]" variable="x"> <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##sidebar-style}match[none]]" variable="x"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/sidebar" tags="" /> <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##sidebar-style}!match[none]]" variable="x"> <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/sidebar]!tag[$:/tags/SideBar]]" variable="x"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/sidebar" tags="$:/tags/SideBar" /> \end \define default-done-message() Congratulations, no stickies left! \define default-done-tooltip() Completed: <> \define default-char-unchecked() ☐ \define default-char-checked() ☒ \define default-active-css() color: red; font-weight: 500; \define default-done-css() font-weight: 500; \define default-shortcut() ctrl-shift-Add \define default-modifier() shift ''Tiddler Bottom Summary''
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="list-style" value="none" actions=<> > None: This turns the in-tiddler list off
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="list-style" value="line" actions=<> > Line: This will show the whole line
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="list-style" value="trim" actions=<> > Trim: This will show the line trimmed
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="list-style" value="todo" actions=<> > Todo: This will show just the todo part
''Sidebar Summary''
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="sidebar-style" value="none" actions=<> > None: This turns the sidebar off
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="sidebar-style" value="line" actions=<> > Line: This will show the whole line
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="sidebar-style" value="trim" actions=<> > Trim: This will show the line trimmed
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="sidebar-style" value="todo" actions=<> > Todo: This will show just the todo part
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="sidebar-searchbar" checked="show" unchecked="hide"> Search bar: Show above sidebar summary ''Table Summary''
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="table-style" value="none" actions=<> > None: This turns table summaries off
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="table-style" value="line" actions=<> > Line: This will show the whole line
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="table-style" value="trim" actions=<> > Trim: This will show the line trimmed
<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="table-style" value="todo" actions=<> > Todo: This will show just the todo part
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="table-searchbar" checked="show" unchecked="hide"> Search bar: Show above table summary ''Done Tooltip''
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="done-tooltip" tag="input" class="sticky-input"/> <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##done-tooltip}!match]" variable="x"> <$button>Restore <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" $index="done-tooltip" $value=<> /> ''Checkbox Character(s)''
Active <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="char-unchecked" tag="input" class="sticky-input-short" size="6"/> {{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##char-unchecked}} <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##char-unchecked}!match]" variable="x"> <$button>Restore <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" $index="char-unchecked" $value=<> />
Done <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="char-checked" tag="input" class="sticky-input-short" size="6"/> {{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##char-checked}} <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##char-checked}!match]" variable="x"> <$button>Restore <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" $index="char-checked" $value=<> />
''Sticky Formatting'' ([ext[help|https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_text.asp]])
Active <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="active-css" tag="input" class="sticky-input-short" size="30"/> Sample active todo <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##active-css}!match]" variable="x"> <$button>Restore <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" $index="active-css" $value=<> />
Done <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="done-css" tag="input" class="sticky-input-short" size="30"/> Sample done todo <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##done-css}!match]" variable="x"> <$button>Restore <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" $index="done-css" $value=<> />
''Apply Sticky Shortcut Key''
Currently it's this key that applies the macro in edit-mode
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/shortcuts/sticky" tag="input" class="sticky-input-short" size="10"/> <$list filter="[{$:/config/shortcuts/sticky}!match]" variable="x"> <$button>Restore <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/shortcuts/sticky" $value=<> /> [[click here to re-map|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts]] (look for sticky) ''Clear Sticky Modifier Key''
Instead of marking a todo as complete or incomplete, you can clear the `<>` piece by holding a modifier key(s) while you click it in view mode.
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="delete-key" tag="input" class="sticky-input-short" size="8"/> <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##delete-key}!match]" variable="x"> <$button>Restore <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" $index="delete-key" $value=<> /> For more info, visit [ext[TiddlyWiki Docs|https://tiddlywiki.com/#modifier%20Variable]] ''All-done Message''
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" index="done-message" tag="input" class="sticky-input"/> <$list filter="[{$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings##done-message}!match]" variable="x"> <$button>Restore <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings" $index="done-message" $value=<> />
$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/config.title: $:/plugins/stobot/sticky/config

$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings.text:
list-style: trim
list-search: ^\W*?(\w|\<.*)
table-style: trim
table-search: ^\W*?(\w|\<.*)
table-searchbar: show
sidebar-style: trim
sidebar-search: ^\W*?(\w|\<.*)
sidebar-searchbar: show
line-search: (.*)
trim-search: ^\W*?(\w|\<.*)
todo-search: .*?(\<\<sticky\s".+?"\>\>).*
done-message: Congratulations, no stickies left!
done-tooltip: Completed: <<now "YYYY-0MM-0DD hh12:0mm pm">>
char-unchecked: ☐
char-checked: ☒
active-css: color: red; font-weight: 500;
done-css: font-weight: 500;
delete-key: shift
$:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings.title: $:/plugins/stobot/sticky/settings
